W13_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_000_DETAIL.text: You acquired a spirit's power. Head back to the Heavens and search for the next spirit.

W13_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_EVAR_MIDO_RETURN_040_DETAIL.text: You acquired power from all the spirits. Time to head back to the Heavens and search for the door to Miyako City.

W13_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W13_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_TITLE.text: The Crowrealm: The World of Sand

W13_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W13_WRLD_MIDO_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: You found a world covered in sand on the other side of the door. Could there really be spirits in a world like this? Or people, for that matter?
